languages.text: {n}На ваших глазах лед, сковавший ноги дознавателя, начинает расти: он покрывает колени мужчины, оборачивается морозным венцом вокруг ножек кресла и стола.{/n} "Срыв продолжается. Из меня сквозит варп-скверна. Я сдерживаю ее... насколько могу".

traits.locale_text: {n}На ваших глазах лед, сковавший ноги дознавателя, начинает расти: он покрывает колени мужчины, оборачивается морозным венцом вокруг ножек кресла и стола.{/n} "Срыв продолжается. Из меня сквозит варп-скверна. Я сдерживаю ее... насколько могу".

languages.text: {n}You watch the ice around his legs begin to spread: it encases his knees, twisting in garlands of ice around the legs of the table and chair.{/n} "The breach is ongoing. Warp corruption is pouring off me. I am holding it back... as much as I can."
languages.original_text: {n}На ваших глазах лед, сковавший ноги дознавателя, начинает расти: он покрывает колени мужчины, оборачивается морозным венцом вокруг ножек кресла и стола.{/n} "Срыв продолжается. Из меня сквозит варп-скверна. Я сдерживаю ее... насколько могу".

traits.locale_text: {n}You watch the ice around his legs begin to spread: it encases his knees, twisting in garlands of ice around the legs of the table and chair.{/n} "The breach is ongoing. Warp corruption is pouring off me. I am holding it back... as much as I can."

{n}You watch the ice around his legs begin to spread: it encases his knees, twisting in garlands of ice around the legs of the table and chair.{/n} "The breach is ongoing. Warp corruption is pouring off me. I am holding it back... as much as I can."

{n}You watch the ice around his legs begin to spread: it encases his knees, twisting in garlands of ice around the legs of the table and chair.{/n} "The breach is ongoing. Warp corruption is pouring off me. I am holding it back... as much as I can."

languages.text: {n}你看到他腿上的寒冰不断向四周蔓延。寒冰裹住了他的膝盖，缠绕在了桌角上。{/n}“裂隙还在不断扩大，亚空间的腐化正从我身上不断涌出来。我正在努力地遏制它……尽我所能。”
languages.original_text: {n}You watch the ice around his legs begin to spread: it encases his knees, twisting in garlands of ice around the legs of the table and chair.{/n} "The breach is ongoing. Warp corruption is pouring off me. I am holding it back... as much as I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}你看到他腿上的寒冰不断向四周蔓延。寒冰裹住了他的膝盖，缠绕在了桌角上。{/n}“裂隙还在不断扩大，亚空间的腐化正从我身上不断涌出来。我正在努力地遏制它……尽我所能。”

languages.text: {n}Ves cómo el hielo de sus piernas se propaga. Cubre sus rodillas y se retuerce formando guirnaldas de hielo en torno a las patas de la mesa y la silla.{/n} «La brecha está activa. La corrupción de la disformidad brota de mi interior. La estoy conteniendo... tanto como puedo».
languages.original_text: {n}You watch the ice around his legs begin to spread: it encases his knees, twisting in garlands of ice around the legs of the table and chair.{/n} "The breach is ongoing. Warp corruption is pouring off me. I am holding it back... as much as I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ves cómo el hielo de sus piernas se propaga. Cubre sus rodillas y se retuerce formando guirnaldas de hielo en torno a las patas de la mesa y la silla.{/n} «La brecha está activa. La corrupción de la disformidad brota de mi interior. La estoy conteniendo... tanto como puedo».

languages.text: {n}彼の足の周りの氷が広がり始め、膝を包み込み、テーブルと椅子の脚に氷の花輪を作るのをあなたは目の当たりにした。{/n}「裂け目は広がっている。歪みの腐敗が俺から流れ出ている。俺はそれを食い止めているんだ…可能な限り」
languages.original_text: {n}You watch the ice around his legs begin to spread: it encases his knees, twisting in garlands of ice around the legs of the table and chair.{/n} "The breach is ongoing. Warp corruption is pouring off me. I am holding it back... as much as I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼の足の周りの氷が広がり始め、膝を包み込み、テーブルと椅子の脚に氷の花輪を作るのをあなたは目の当たりにした。{/n}「裂け目は広がっている。歪みの腐敗が俺から流れ出ている。俺はそれを食い止めているんだ…可能な限り」

languages.text: {n}La glace progresse autour de ses jambes jusqu'à englober ses genoux ; elle commence même à recouvrir les pieds de la table et du fauteuil sur lequel il s'est assis.{/n} « La brèche est toujours ouverte. La corruption du Warp se déverse à travers moi. J'essaie de la contenir... autant que je peux. »
languages.original_text: {n}You watch the ice around his legs begin to spread: it encases his knees, twisting in garlands of ice around the legs of the table and chair.{/n} "The breach is ongoing. Warp corruption is pouring off me. I am holding it back... as much as I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}La glace progresse autour de ses jambes jusqu'à englober ses genoux ; elle commence même à recouvrir les pieds de la table et du fauteuil sur lequel il s'est assis.{/n} « La brèche est toujours ouverte. La corruption du Warp se déverse à travers moi. J'essaie de la contenir... autant que je peux. »

languages.text: {n}Du siehst, wie sich das Eis an seinen Beinen ausbreitet. Es windet sich in Girlanden von seinen Knien aus um Tisch- und Stuhlbeine.{/n} "Der Riss ist noch in vollem Gange. Ich bin erfasst von Warp-Verderbnis. Ich kämpfe dagegen an ... so gut ich kann."
languages.original_text: {n}You watch the ice around his legs begin to spread: it encases his knees, twisting in garlands of ice around the legs of the table and chair.{/n} "The breach is ongoing. Warp corruption is pouring off me. I am holding it back... as much as I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du siehst, wie sich das Eis an seinen Beinen ausbreitet. Es windet sich in Girlanden von seinen Knien aus um Tisch- und Stuhlbeine.{/n} "Der Riss ist noch in vollem Gange. Ich bin erfasst von Warp-Verderbnis. Ich kämpfe dagegen an ... so gut ich kann."

languages.original_text: {n}You watch the ice around his legs begin to spread: it encases his knees, twisting in garlands of ice around the legs of the table and chair.{/n} "The breach is ongoing. Warp corruption is pouring off me. I am holding it back... as much as I can."

languages.text: {n}Bacaklarının etrafını saran buzun yayılışını izliyorsun. Dizlerini kaplayarak masanın ve sandalyenin ayaklarının etrafına buzdan eğri büğrü şeritler çekiyor.{/n} "Kırılma sürüyor. Öte yozlaşması beni tüketiyor. Onu elimden geldiğince... Zapt ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}You watch the ice around his legs begin to spread: it encases his knees, twisting in garlands of ice around the legs of the table and chair.{/n} "The breach is ongoing. Warp corruption is pouring off me. I am holding it back... as much as I can."
